description: A sewn dynamic sling for secure clipping to belays and rap anchors. It delivers better dynamic performance than a conventional sewn webbing, greatly reducing impact force. Meets the recommendations of the FQME for a dynamic lanyard.Made of nylon.Extremely strong 2200kg breaking load.Factor 1 falls impact force: 6.2 kN.Factor 1 falls rating:  20.Factor 2 falls impact force: 9.5 kN.Factor 2 falls rating: 15.Length is 80cm.Available in a variety of colours, and you won't be able to choose. Life is so uncertain.
name: Beal Dynaconnexion Dynamic Lanyard
